description:
Used in step-forms.

```html
<form-step :active-step="currentStep" v-if="currentStep == 1" :key="1">
 <form-first-name v-model="submit.firstName"/>
 <form-last-name v-model="submit.lastName"/>
</form-step>
```
comment:

 *  <form-first-name v-model="submit.firstName"/>
 *  <form-last-name v-model="submit.lastName"/>
 * </form-step>
 * ```
 */
